lead_paragraph: Law enforcement is wrestling with a surge in marijuana-infused snacks and confections transported illegally across state lines for resale.

headline.print_headline: New Police Challenge: Finding Pot in Lollipops and Marshmallows
headline.main: New Challenge for Police: Finding Pot in Lollipops and Marshmallows

snippet: Law enforcement is wrestling with a surge in marijuana-infused snacks and confections transported illegally across state lines for resale.
abstract: Police departments across nation are encountering surge of 'pot edibles,' marijuana-infused snacks and candies that are being smuggled for resale from states where marijuana is legal; fear is that treats can fall into hands of children, or novice consumers of marijuana who may eat too much at once, fooled by deceptively slow high of pot edibles.
